Yeah after 900 days of having a streak I just deleted the app and freeing myself from the owl. It's just annoying that, for a language like Japanese, Duolingo doesn't show enough of *why* things are as they are. And when I make mistakes I need a subscription to get it explained! Ridiculous. How am I supposed to learn that way???

App doesn't start up anymore. I only see a green screen with the text Duolingo. First I got the same lesson every time. I installed the app again several times. Also removed the cache etcetera. And now I only see the green screen. And now the browser version is also not working anymore... Error 500. I can only start an old lesson. More than a month later: still not working. I sent a message to the helpdesk... they did not reply...

Teacher Quizlet plus.. Since you have to pay for Quizlet, it feels like it became worse. The login is confusing for my students (user name, e-mail, or one of your (4?) soc. media accounts,. Then I have to invite them manually to my class (10+classes) and I'm waisting time doing this admin and helping my students to recover their accounts. Game asteroids is gone. Tests are too easy (combine term and definition needs more options, not eg 4 on 4 ,now you can guess). Improvement desired to keep it.

sample_reasons: why can i see random people in my feed? i dont want to see them, only my friends. And i dont want others to see my stuff. please change if back otherwise i will cancel my subscription.

I didn't use this app anymore. So I cancelled my subscription last year. Never got an email of my cancellation. Now I found out I was billed AGAIN? I checked and cancelled my subscription again as it wasn't cancelled apparently. This time I'm not recieving any e-mail obout my cancellation either? Will I be billed again next year too? Is it possible to get a refund?

Watch out for this app! They will try to trick you with an automatic subscription renewal after 2 years at twice the original price (€150 in my case) without warning. The internet is full of people with similar experiences. I got my refund in the end, but maybe that's only because I wrote a lengthy email explaining why what they're doing is technically illegal... Just Google "When is auto-renewal of consumer contracts likely to be unfair?" and you will find the arguments you need!

leave_conditions: You can only try the app if you sign up with your e-mail adres or Google Facebook account, so they can spam you with offers. Uninstalled immediately a...

busuu: I know six languages and, in my opinion, Busuu is the best language learning app available in the Play Store. Thank you for the great value you offer!
Top, leuk om te leren bij busuu
memrise: Uitstekende flashcardapp die doet wat het belooft met allerlei opties om het leren niet eentonig en efficiënter te maken. Veel gratis cursussen van aardige gebruikers gratis te gebruiken. Veel beter dan Memrise en minder saai dan Anki.
Gebruik Duolingo, Babbel en Memrise, maar dit is een totaal andere ervaring. Vooral dat je gewoon Nederlands - Portugees kunt leren ipv Engels - Portugees
babbel: I love Busuu because it gives more explanation than for instance Duo. Also it is more Spain oriented and teaches past tense as well as the vosotros forms as well. I find Babbel confusing because they use long sentences I don't understand yet in their examples. People nagging about it is useless when free: this is a paid form of learning. And they do it very well. Want free? Use a different program. Oh, at last, what I really like: you can get in touch with native speakers who can correct you
Gebruik Duolingo, Babbel en Memrise, maar dit is een totaal andere ervaring. Vooral dat je gewoon Nederlands - Portugees kunt leren ipv Engels - Portugees
rosetta: Ik had rosetta stone gedownload om Noors te leren maar dat is geen optie alsjeblieft pas dit aan

Ik denk niet dat Rosetta Stone mij als klant wil. Mijn e-mailadres dat gewoon werkt, wordt als ongeldig gezien. Mijn kind dat graag Frans wil leren, mag geen aankoop vragen via Family Link. Dit lijkt me een vrij basale sign-up flow. Bij andere taal-apps werkt dat wel gewoon.
anki: Uitstekende flashcardapp die doet wat het belooft met allerlei opties om het leren niet eentonig en efficiënter te maken. Veel gratis cursussen van aardige gebruikers gratis te gebruiken. Veel beter dan Memrise en minder saai dan Anki.

perfect_app_summary: No ads or reasonable ad frequency

sample_quotes: Opent soms niet of erg traag. Vraag me af of hij nog werkt. Kosten 35 euro. Weggegooid

I'm missing the option to use my native Dutch language. Also, it would have been nice if there was Dutch as an option to learn for foreign people. The grammatica learning in this app is the best I have seen so far.

5 sterren voor de informatie en de 'live' mogelijkheden om in de community feedback te krijgen op schrijven en uitspraak. 2 sterren omdat je maar enkele lessen kunt doen zonder betaalde account en het feit dat je wel Nederlands kunt leren met deze app maar als je Nederlands talig bent en je wilt bijvoorbeeld Frans leren dan verloopt dit in het Engels....logica????? Daarom het gemiddelde van 3 sterren.
